name: Cast Below
description:
In a fantasy world completely set underground, young Pux does not have it easy! Getting bossed around by his teacher of the arcane, on a daily bases, he is now tasked with collecting materials for a magic wand, as his teacher seems to have lost his ancient staff. Reluctantly, he agrees and ventures out from their hideout, located in a giant magical tree. On his quest, he will meet all sorts of weird personalities, that inhabit this whimsical world, some of whom will help, while others will hinder him on his mission.

Controls

Keyboard:          WASD to Move               E/Left Mouse to Interact          Esc to Pause

Gamepad:          Left Control Stick to Move               South Button to Interact               Start to Pause
